Context:
The Media Acting - Graduate Intensive seven-week certificate program can be applied to directly through George Brown College. The application process is initiated after filling in and submitting the form provided on their website. This program is intended for actors who have graduated from recognized theatre schools and aim to enhance their on-camera acting skills.

Application-related queries can be directed to media@georgebrown.ca. Prospective students are encouraged to sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, events, tours, and more using the "Sign Up Now" feature. The contact numbers provided for inquiries are 416-415-2000 (voice) and TTY: 1-871-515-5559. George Brown College's email address for general queries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Website visitors are advised that the information contained on the site is subject to change without notice, and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
